will focus`` externally on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership,'' the company announced. Eric Schmidt will act as an advisor to Page and Sergey Brin . We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time. By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company, Eric Schmidt said in a press release.`` In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come.'' to make room for co-founder Larry Page. Eric Schmidt will move into an Executive Chairman role. But why? And what does it mean for you? According to Eric Schmidt : Larry will now lead product development and technology strategy, his greatest strengths, and starting from April 4 he will take charge of our day-to-day operations as Google's Chief Executive Officer. In this new role I know he will merge Google's technology and business vision brilliantly. The third leg of the triumvirate, Sergey Brin , will take the title of Co-Founder, focusing on new products.
